references.paper_title: Imagenet classification with deep convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational for deep learning and its applications in image recognition, directly impacting the field of neurodynamical models that are compared in this paper.

This paper introduced the LSTM architecture, a crucial recurrent neural network design that is benchmarked against in this work, demonstrating significant advancements in handling long-term dependencies in sequences.

references.paper_title: The stabilized supralinear network: a unifying circuit motif underlying multi-input integration in sensory cortex
references.reason: This paper introduced the SSN model, a biologically plausible recurrent neural network that is compared in this study, highlighting efforts towards creating trainable neurodynamical models.

references.paper_title: Normalization as a canonical neural computation
references.reason: This review paper establishes divisive normalization (DN) as a fundamental neural computation, which is the core mechanism implemented and analyzed in the ORGANICs model presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Oscillatory recurrent gated neural integrator circuits (ORGANICs), a unifying theoretical framework for neural dynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces the ORGANICs model, the focus of the current research, providing the foundation for the stability analysis and applications explored in the current work.
